name: Pirate Booty Defense
description: A small game made by our group for the University of Minnesota - Morris CSCI 4660 class - Processes, Programming and Languages: Introduction to Computer Game Development. This was a small project created to introduce us to the world of game design and development, and is by no means considered 'finished'. This game was developed by Noah Constable, Hoomz Damte, Jacob Jennes, and Michael Fairbanks. The GitHub repo can be found at https://github.com/nwconstable/Game-Dev-Iteration-2.
